00132 public:

00148 #endif

00160 class CamuleApp : public AMULE_APP_BASE, public CamuleAppCommon
00161 {
00162 private:
00163     enum APPState {
00164         APP_STATE_RUNNING = 0,
00165         APP_STATE_SHUTTINGDOWN,
00166         APP_STATE_STARTING
00167     };
00168 
00169 public:
00170     CamuleApp();

00172

00174     int     OnExit();
00175 #if wxUSE_ON_FATAL_EXCEPTION
00176     void        OnFatalException();
00177 #endif
00178     bool        ReinitializeNetwork(wxString *msg);
00179 
00180     // derived classes may override those
00181     virtual int InitGui(bool geometry_enable, wxString &geometry_string);
00182 
00183     // Socket handlers
00184     void ListenSocketHandler(wxSocketEvent& event);
00185     void ServerSocketHandler(wxSocketEvent& event);
00186     void UDPSocketHandler(wxSocketEvent& event);
00187 
00188     virtual int ShowAlert(wxString msg, wxString title, int flags) = 0;
00189 
00190     // Barry - To find out if app is running or shutting/shut down
00191     bool IsRunning() const { return (m_app_state == APP_STATE_RUNNING); }
00192     bool IsOnShutDown() const { return (m_app_state == APP_STATE_SHUTTINGDOWN); }
00193 
00194     // Check ED2K and Kademlia state
00195     bool IsFirewalled() const;

00197     bool IsConnected() const;

00199     bool IsConnectedED2K() const;
00200 
00201     // What about Kad? Is it running?

00208     bool IsFirewalledKadUDP() const;

00210     bool IsKadRunningInLanMode() const;
00211     // Kad stats
00212     uint32  GetKadUsers() const;
00213     uint32  GetKadFiles() const;

00420 // wxWidgets 2.8 requires special code for event handling and sockets.
00421 // 2.9 doesn't, so standard event loop and sockets can be used
00422 //
00423 // Windows: aMuled compiles with 2.8 (without the special code),
00424 // but works only with 2.9
00425 
00426 #if !wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 9, 0)
00427     #ifdef __WXMSW__
00428         // MSW: can't run amuled with 2.8 anyway, just get it compiled
00429         #define AMULED_DUMMY
00430     #else
00431         #define AMULED28
00432     #endif
00433 #endif
00434 
00435 #ifdef AMULED28
00436 #include <wx/socket.h>
00437

00441 class CAmuledGSocketFuncTable : public GSocketGUIFunctionsTable
00442 {
00443 private:
00444     CSocketSet *m_in_set, *m_out_set;
00445 
00446     wxMutex m_lock;
00447 public:
00448     CAmuledGSocketFuncTable();
00449 
00450     void AddSocket(GSocket *socket, GSocketEvent event);
00451     void RemoveSocket(GSocket *socket, GSocketEvent event);
00452     void RunSelect();
00453 
00454     virtual bool OnInit();
00455     virtual void OnExit();
00456     virtual bool CanUseEventLoop();
00457     virtual bool Init_Socket(GSocket *socket);
00458     virtual void Destroy_Socket(GSocket *socket);
00459     virtual void Install_Callback(GSocket *socket, GSocketEvent event);
00460     virtual void Uninstall_Callback(GSocket *socket, GSocketEvent event);
00461     virtual void Enable_Events(GSocket *socket);
00462     virtual void Disable_Events(GSocket *socket);
00463 };

00466 #endif // AMULED28
